author: munsif husni
comment: It look so real.. by using always on display mode, it look amazing at night.. people keep asking me, why my watch so bright & glows..

author: Lou Ozment
comment: Excellent, I swear the sec sweep hand looks so real, very realistic. Good job dev!

author: Saulius Sipaitis
comment: Great looking watchface on my LG G watch R, really really love it!!!

author: Martin Hoare
comment: When looking at watch the face comes up black then flips to white. I think this will be very annoying and stop me using it. Very nice face othwise.
title: Screen slow to load

author: C P Lib
comment: This face looks great but has very few settings.  I would like to set the display time to something other than 5 seconds. Always on, kills the battery.
title: Needs more customizations

author: Craig McAnuff
comment: Finally decided to pull the trigger on this watch face last night and boy I'm glad I did!  It's really well-designed and looks amazing on my Huawei Watch.
title: Love this watch face!

author: William Aung Leyraud
comment: Straight to the point, professional design, no battery hugs bells and whistles. My every day watch face, great job! Please keep up the professional grade designs and you'll get a loyal customer.
title: Developer's master piece!

author: Dana Sciandra
comment: I've downloaded and created a lot of watch faces, but this one has been my favorite / daily driver because of how elegant, clean and beautiful it is. I have mine set to night mode (dark) all the time, and I absolutely love the ambient mode face, which looks really cool. For someone who is constantly changing my watch face, I haven't changed it since downloading this one, which is the best endorsement I can give.

author: Eddie Harrington
comment: The ability to customize it a little more is all that it lacks.  For example, I prefer a second hand that sweeps as opposes to ticks. Looks great on my Huwaei Watch.
title: Very very nice but....

author: Cody Schadegg
comment: Phone battery isn't working on this face and many others from this same developer. Used to work perfect with same phone and same watch. Also, doesn't accept changes like choosing for day nice to be on all the time and watch still goes to night mode... So far no correspondence from developer... Finally fixed, never had contact with developer still...
title: Sharp

comment: I paid for this app,  and the only options it gives is to get another app with in app purchasing ability.
title: This app is horrible

author: John Leigh
comment: No settings and very simple.  Looks nice but tge battery level of my ohone not working
title: Not working as expected

author: John Boatner
comment: Not very customizable. It would be nice if I could change the inside dials to pedometer and such.
title: Classy but...

author: Darrow Zeidenstein
comment: Obviously, one watch face cannot please all people. However, I find this watch face particularly elegant and functional.
title: Best watch face yet

author: andrew zarins
comment: Would be better if it had an option to just dim the screen rather than using ambient mode. However, this is a high quality watch face looks sharp and simple on the huawei watch.
title: Looks good

author: Brook Zerihun
comment: Deceptive all the way, it does nothing, what customizations? Save your money pass on this
title: What a joke

author: Sasha Fleming
comment: The screen looks ok but as almost zero customisation is possible it is a fail for a smart watch.
title: Almost zero customisation

author: bryantut1609
comment: Really nice looking Watch Face, no issues what so ever.

author: German O
comment: It's looks very nice on my moto 360
title: Nice

author: J Knight_D7
comment: Great!! Worth the money!... Cause I don't have time to customize watch faces. I will be buying more Liongate faces!
title: Stylish, and simple!!

author: jack milligan
comment: Nice face but not fully functional
title: Phone battery level doesn't update

comment: The phone battery is not working. Other than that it's a wonderful watch face.
title: Great but...

author: Dean Gunraj
comment: The graphics are very real and there's tons of features.

author: Sorin Lavric
comment: For now is locking OK ^_^
title: Just installed now

comment: Clean and well design. Very good looking watch face.

author: Arjoca Vlad
comment: Till now, for me this is the best😆
title: The best

author: Andrew Johnson
comment: Nice watch face looks great

author: Derrick Matthews
comment: Thankyou

author: Ronaldo Suhartanto
comment: Simple yet elegant.......
title: Very nice

author: Barbaros Ugur YILMAZ
comment: This watch face is really so good.. But just one thing when it's in dim mode you can see the screen is shaking.
title: The best I ever downloaded

author: Denny Kun
comment: It is good face but too bad its flickering in ambient mode when you used the white background other else is good... Fix that and i will change to 5 star
title: Flickering faces

author: Uptown Dude
comment: Great watch face with a great ambient mode that sticks to Google's guidelines. A must have for everyone android wear watch owner (especially one with OLED). Only 4 stars as while the face itself is great and HD the ambient  mode is grainy.
title: Beautiful

author: Hanibal Hilmi
comment: I bought and downlod this faces to my Samsung note 5 but i can't use it on gear s2. Could you please help me to solve this problem
title: It dose not work on Samsung gear s2

author: Ken Dawson
comment: This is one of my few paid apps and I cannot figure out how to get it to work on HTC One.

author: Frederico Hayes
comment: I love this face but it would be nice to be able to extend the time that the face is displayed before going to ambient mode.
title: Classic face! .

author: Anthony Acosta
comment: Hey this seems like a great piece of work, however I can't get the content  to my watch. Are these compatible at all?
title: Galaxy gear S2 Classic?

author: Sigge Lindhe
comment: Clean and goodlooking. The "black-blink" when going from active to ambient is the only complaint.

author: Tony Collins
comment: I love how ambient mode is configurable, it let's down so many other faces.
title: Best face so far

author: Mark Johnson
comment: Solid, stylish design. Exactly the type of face I am looking for as a watch-guy.
title: Classy

author: Shawn Keenen
comment: Definitely one of my favorites.  Very clean easy to read.  Love it.
title: Favorite
